entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who was called back up the stairs by Harry. She is described as running back up the stairs and reacting to the news about Regulus.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who found out about R.A.B. and told Hermione about it. He is described as calm when talking to Hermione.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is mentioned as Sirius's brother and a Death Eater. Harry tells Hermione that Regulus joined the Death Eaters but tried to leave and was killed.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as Harry's friend who told him about his brother Regulus.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who was called by Hermione to come up the stairs. He appears panting and with his wand ready.

relationships.description: Hermione called Ron to come up the stairs
